    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    A generic abstract Data Access Object responsible for the CRUD operations for any object.
    AppModel
     
    Bill
    Represents a bill with details about an order.
    BillDAO
    Data Access Object for the Bill model.
    Client
    Represents a client.
    ClientBLL
    Business Logic Layer class responsible for managing client operations.
    ClientDAO
    Data Access Object for the Client model.
    ConnectionFactory
    Responsible for establishing the connection to the database.
    Controller
    Class responsible for coordinating the interaction between the graphical user interface and the business logic layer.
    Main
     
    OrderBLL
    Business Logic Layer class responsible for managing order operations.
    OrderDAO
    Data Access Object for the Orders model.
    Orders
     
    Product
     
    ProductBLL
    Business Logic Layer class responsible for managing product operations.
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object for the Product model.
    Student
     
    TableReflection
    Class responsible to populate a table with data from a list of objects.
    View
    Class responsible for the graphical user interface of the Orders Management Application.
